trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SEQ_00<tab>Managingway looks both confused and concerned.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Shakingway.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_TODO_01<tab>Try to defeat Shakingway in a battle of /dance.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_TODO_02<tab>Try to defeat Shakingway in a battle of /dance again.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_TODO_03<tab>Report back to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>While most of our Ways are content with rhythmical hopping, Shakingway has recently expressed a desire to master the ways of “dance.”

TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>As I understand it, mankind's myriad cultures are well versed in this activity, so I was hoping you might humor his request for a...dancing battle? I'm not entirely clear on the particulars.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_MANAGINGWAY_000_005<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Our dancing friend Shakingway has been asking for you.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_MANAGINGWAY_000_006<tab>Might you spare him a moment? It seems he wishes to battle again.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_MANAGINGWAY_000_007<tab>You'll find him practicing in Bestways Burrow. I have no doubt he is itching to witness your “moves.”
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_010<tab>Come one, come all! Challenge Shakingway and fall!

TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_011<tab>Aaah! Y-You're that person! A-Ahem... You there, person-<var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>─<var 08 E905 ((why favor me with your address?)) ((better speak before you make me mad!)) /var>
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_013<tab>A challenge of dance? All right, very well! I'll dance you to death and send you to...uh...was it “hells”?
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_014<tab>Aaah! It's you! Erm... Come again to see my moves? You will find me much improved!
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_015<tab>At the musicking station, the fates will decide. On our battle I'll wager my name and my pride!
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_020<tab>My dancing skill is second to none! You can show me your moves, but I've already won!
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>Shakingway is getting ahead of himself. Show him the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>dance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> of a real champion.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_021<tab>Whoa, what was that? Such beauty, such grace... Erm! Ha-ha-ha, your dance is weak! I'm still the dance master of whom all speak!

TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Shakingway doesn't acknowledge that movement as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>dance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Only <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>dance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will change his opinion of you.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_023<tab>What the─!? That was amazing! How did you─I-I mean! You were lucky! That was luck! Bet you can't do it again, you...puck?
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_024<tab>If this is a dream, don't wake me... Ahem! I-I mean! Is that really the best you can do? Then do it again─but you can't, can you?
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>It seems you've caught Shakingway's attention. Show him your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>dance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> again for the win.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_030<tab>Lost your nerve? Don't want to play? The reigning champ is Shakingway!
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SYSTEM_100_030<tab>Shakingway is gaining confidence again. Finish him by showing him your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>dance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_031<tab>Ha! You only had a lucky streak─my sensational moves cannot be beat!

TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>Shakingway doesn't acknowledge that movement as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>dance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and to make matters worse, he now derides you in slant rhyme. Demand his respect with an unparalleled display of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>dance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_033<tab>Hgk! Th-That... That was amazing. The <var 09 E948 ((sweetness of the)) ((grace within the)) ((cheer within the)) ((love within the)) ((fortitude of)) ((gorgeousness of)) ((intensity of)) ((mystery in the)) /var> moves you render... You have earned my due surrender.
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_034<tab>How strange... Watching your dance has filled me with inner peace. I feel confident...courageous, even. A-Ahem!
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_035<tab>Th-This isn't over! I may retreat, but next time I will not be beat!
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_SHAKINGWAY_000_036<tab>I'll chase my dream till I'm king of the moon─I'll have my revenge! We'll meet again soon!
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_MANAGINGWAY_000_040<tab>Ah, you're back. I just saw Shakingway dash past with tears in his eyes, so I assume you won your little bout?
TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_MANAGINGWAY_000_041<tab>Revenge, you say? Then it sounds as though we shall require more of your time in the future.

TEXT_BANLOP104_04690_MANAGINGWAY_000_042<tab>I do hate to trouble you, but sometimes I wonder if he isn't simply in need of a playfellow. Thank you for your kindness, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
